text: [Music]
have you a felon here even though I have
put up quite a long playlist of dishes
you can serve with rice for your
everyday family meals new request for
more keep popping up in the comments
like this one so today I will show you
another simple dish twist room and with
just a few ingredients you might already
have in the pantry
it's called caramelized coconut shrimps
or Thumbelina cook you the sweet rich
and savory taste of the shrimp gotta
come perfect with rice let's begin for
this recipe you will need 200 gram of
shrimp your kitchen chest to trim off
the tip of the hat and the tails just
for it in half and cut right behind the
eyes then also trim the legs and rings
throughout and brain
next bring a pan on medium heat and add
2 tbsp of vegetable oil and fry the mix
calyx and seal fragrance for about 10
seconds and then tossing the shrimp and
turn the heat to high to get that red
color out of the shrooms really quickly
then add just a little bit of thought
about our quarter teaspoon and then toss
well this will help to make the skin
more crunchy up to about 2 to 3 minutes
the shrimp will turn orange completely
now add 2 TSP of sugar and toss well for
about 2 minutes
then add about 1/3 cup of coconut milk
bring the heat down to medium-low and
simmer for about 3 to 5 minutes until
the sauce is absorbed into the shrimp
making it extra rich and flavorful the
sauce should be added and last step to
bring up the amazing beautiful aroma if
you're not familiar with eating shrimp
with the skin on you can peel it when
you eat but please leave it on while
cooking to avoid overcooking the shrimp
making it too rubbery as simple as that
you have a perfect savory dish for a
daily meal with rice just with a
sprinkle of a freshly cracked pepper and
some chopped scallion on top and voila
mmm that garlic and coconut smell so
tempting and that's one secret tip that
everybody will love that is to add some
hot steamed rice into the pan with a
sticky sauce and give it a good stir and
then you can have a extra flavorful and
rich coconut rice so so so good
I hope you enjoyed today recipe and if
